<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 370 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Ashava](/Deities.aspx?ID=114), [Atreia](/Deities.aspx?ID=101), [Bolka](/Deities.aspx?ID=85), [Immonhiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=238), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=54), [Kofusachi](/Deities.aspx?ID=177), [Korada](/Deities.aspx?ID=123), [Mother Vulture](/Deities.aspx?ID=142), [Naderi](/Deities.aspx?ID=157), [Osiris](/Deities.aspx?ID=56), [Qi Zhong](/Deities.aspx?ID=182), [Selket](/Deities.aspx?ID=59), [The Lost Prince](/Deities.aspx?ID=96), [The Offering Plate](/Deities.aspx?ID=254), [Tlehar](/Deities.aspx?ID=217), [Touch of the Sun](/Deities.aspx?ID=233), [Tsukiyo](/Deities.aspx?ID=48), [Wards of the Pharaoh](/Deities.aspx?ID=208)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You grace the target's mind, boosting its mental defenses and healing its wounds. The target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points when you Cast the Spell and gains a +2 status bonus to saves against mental effects for the duration.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The amount of healing increases by 1d10+4.
